section_recommended.description: Try out the service by storing your first secret.

section_recommended.title: Best practices for organizing your secrets and assigning access
section_recommended.description: Review suggested guidelines for organizing your secrets.

tiles.title: Now available: Get secret value by name
tiles.description: Users can now get a secret and its details by specifying the name and type of the secret through the API. This functionality is also available in CLI and SDKs.

tiles.title: Now available: new API and CLI versions
tiles.description: The new API, SDK, Terraform, and CLI versions offer more options to manage your Secrets Manager instance. The Secrets Manager API v1 has been deprecated in favor of v2.

tiles.title: Support for context-based restrictions (CBR)
tiles.description: Manage user and service access to your Secrets Manager resources by using context-based restrictions.

tiles.title: Manually configure your own DNS provider
tiles.description: Your DNS provider isn't integrated with the service? You can now manually configure it by using the UI.

tiles.title: Add custom metadata to your secret versions and auto-rotate IAM credentials
tiles.description: Do you need more space to log details about your secret versions? Add relevant information as metadata.
